Review.Contenu: I signed up to 800.com and there was a  problem with my number, which would not allow me to dial out. I asked for a credit, which I did not receive. I was not able to use my minutes that I'd paid for. A representative told me that a supervisor was going to call me back. I never received that call. I attempted to pay for the second month and the website would not take my PayPal payment. I called PayPal who said the company 800.com's website appeared to be caught in a loop of some sort and I should try a different browser. I tried a different browser and it still wouldn't work. I keep trying to pay it and the 800.com website won't accept my payment. Right now, when clients call my 800 number they get a busy signal.

I wanted something temporarily, simple for my startup. Basically, a number to satisfy one of the "many" bureaucratic requirements that go hand in hand with setting up a corporation. While waiting for my online platform to launch.I found the interface time consuming and the AI voice? Terrible. Worst of all, "800.com" kept charging my card after I CANCELLED the service and was clearly not using it for months.
Serious LimitationsThis tool only allows for 60 second voicemails...which means people get cut off in the middle of trying to explain their issue. Not helpful!

Our company was interested in a vanity number that they had. We were informed that it couldn't be ported out but only leased and a subscription was needed in order to lease it. The subscription is quoted at $260 & the lease $970. This includes no services. It's absolutely absurd.
very bad service. account is removed any time. he does not send any mail or update. customer service is very week. specially mr. Ray. having no information.

I paid for a year upfront “to save $48 in additional fees”. I authorized a $228 charge but they charged $269.04 to my card. When contacted, they said this was for “federal and other fees”. I told them this is very misleading and those fees should have been revealed up front. Number cancelled.
Very bad cost of service. And you did not approve my account
OOMA my telephone service provider advised me that 800.com wouldn’t release my 8774267552 number

Review.Titre: They took money of my card & asked me…
Review.Contenu: They took money of my card & asked me to send my confidential documents which upon request was cancelled so i asked for refund. Instead of refunding they activated the accou nt & said you cannot get refund & never receiced a single incoming call on that number & took my money.

Review.Titre: Don't used this they have fake…
Review.Contenu: Don't used this they have fake advertising offers unlimited calling supposedly and then when you used 2500 minutes bang they said you need to paid 200 for 5000 minutes that's nothing don't used this company bad experience.

Review.Titre: Personally I do not agree with the cancellation difficulty
Review.Contenu: Personally I do not agree with the slowness and difficulty of cancelling your 800# service. This needs to be rectified by 800.com . They make it very difficult, and its been over 82 Hours since I sent the email to cancel and still no response. Not e ven an auto  - responder email. 800.com , just MAKE IT EASY TO CANCEL ON YOUR WEBSITE, OK? This really sucks!

Review.Titre: This is a fairly subpar service…
Review.Contenu: This is a fairly subpar service provider - calls are delayed and there's a 1-2 second lag between the speaker and the caller. Their website sometimes doesn't let me make calls. No idea why, it just doesn't. You can't make calls from a landline or your phone. And it's pretty expensive for what it offers.

Review.Titre: forwarding number instructions do not work
Review.Contenu: I can't read the instructions on how to forward the number

Review.Titre: It rings it doesn’t ring it works and…
Review.Contenu: It rings it doesn’t ring it works and doesn’t work. The excuses are endless. Until I can find something better than 800.com I’m stuck with them.

800.com kept inserting their own advertisement. It stated to the caller to purchase a phone number from 800.com after the caller dialed the number and before prompting them to leave a message. It gave the impression that the caller must have reached a wrong number. I have a paid service and this is so inconvenient. On 3 separate occasions i removed the advertisement and had to reset my own message each time.

Review.Titre: The best feature is the recording
Review.Contenu: The best feature is the recording. System has issues we reported were supposed to get a call back never did. Hope they take our suggestions as some things don't make sense.
Just ok, what more can I say.

Review.Contenu: The quality of your calls is choppy.CS is great, but I'm not sure I will continue next month if the choppy robotic quality is not resolved

Though I don't understand why they have started or why they are silent with no one on the call. I understand that I am not being charged for them and I appreciate that.

Review.Titre: The 800 functions is not what I thought…
Review.Contenu: The 800 functions is not what I thought it would be.

The customer service reps are courteous. There is a problem in that greetings cannot be easily deleted and restored. Also, invoices are not delivered (by email or by post) unless explicitly requested. That seems odd. Overall, I recommend the service.

Review.Titre: Price is right service is great
Review.Contenu: Price is right service is great. Just wish I could call out from my 800 Number. I curretley pay for 2 services because I cant call out

Review.Titre: I am impressed with how much they want…to make me feel that I am confident in using this
Review.Contenu: I am impressed with how much they want to make me feel like I am a valued customer. Just checking up and making sure that I am doing alright. So far its been great. Still learning all about it but day by day I am learning something new.

As entrepreneurs and realtors in multiple states and counties, my business partner, and I also sisters decided to start the process of marginal business together to collaborate on all fronts. We decided to go with 800.com so that we could have one a number that was close to customization easy to remember and also Flexibility. The capabilities options to choose which one to speak to a general voicemail. The option to text the calls and also to have a log on our app is an excellent resource.

Easy and affordable. Great functionality. Customer support was fast and helpful. I only wish it were more explicitly clear and documented that we own our new 800# number and can port it away from 800.com anytime for any reason if we ever want to or need to take our number in-house. There are a couple of support articles that talk about how to do it but there's too much confusing language around it. A phone number should be like a domain name with clear lines of ownership.
Good customer service, straight forward app, would like to see ability to delete phone numbers from call log

Review.Titre: The only issue I had was with follow…
Review.Contenu: The only issue I had was with follow up; I was sent an email to alert me to allow five business days for activation, which was very nice.  However, I did not hear from anyone again until I received this survey.  If we are informed to wait, we should also be informed when the wait is over, I would think.  This would be a great opportunity for a celebratory email that says, "Congrats! Your number is ready to use!!"  I only received confirmation that my number was active after emailing support to confirm.  Seems like a step that should be automated, honestly.
Customer service is excellent, but I cannot delete my messages from the app. This seriously needs to change.

Had an issue early on and was very concerned with a number I've had for over 30 years, it wasn't working and they were at first not able to fix it right away. After 4 or 5 business days it seems to be resolved.
Fairly easy online interface, well designed iOS app.

Review.Titre: The time support took to help me was…
Review.Contenu: The time support took to help me was really appreciated. I was having a little yellow bus moment when trying to set up my voicemail.

I like the service but I think you should have someone completely set up the number all in one shot. I had to set up call forwarding after and it took me a minute to figure it out. But I'm not tech savvy so it could just be me. Other than that it's a solid service so far. A little pricey but easier and cheaper than a landline because I can use my laptop or mobile. It goes where I go. It gives me credibility. But the vanity nber has 2 extra numbers that no one will ever type. Lol. I thought that was weird. But who's gonna know? Lol 😆
Perfect response; However, I would like to be listed as a true business in your system.  I think... I could get more customers.

Review.Titre: We were looking for an 800 type number…
Review.Contenu: We were looking for an 800 type number for our new construction company and 800.com was there. We found one with our initials in seconds and their customer service was extremely helpful right from the get go. The only thing I would like to see changed is the UI for the website. It works just fine though and this is more of just a preference.

Review.Titre: A must have as a nation wide consulting…
Review.Contenu: A must have as a nation wide consulting company.To provide the best service and access for local clients, a single 800 number is not only welcome, but required.Scenario: A consultant locates in Boston for a large client.  That client does not have to call San Diego, to contact a consultant, in the conference room down the hallway. The consultant previous client, located in Dallas, calls the same 800 number they always did, to ask a simple question.If this is you and your business, this 800 service is essential.  Essential.

Initially had trouble dialing the 800 number from a normal landline number without it calling a person with the first 7 digits of our toll free phone number locally. It was fixed but annoying at first because the woman it kept calling locally was none too pleased with us. Eventually it allowed us to dial our complete 11 digit number from a landline without further issue. Only problem is we don't know how many customers dialed in from a landline or their office phone to our company and got the upset local woman who was fed up with getting our company calls.

Great customer service! the issues was not totally resolved as the caller was not directed to the 800.com recording after I let it ring. And similarly when I silenced by iPhone ringer with one click after the caller called....the caller was sent to my iPhone recording.

Review.Titre: I was looking for a way to see if a fax…
Review.Contenu: I was looking for a way to see if a fax was received.  800.com was quick to respond but said that feature was no longer available.  Turns out I think it is... A blue dot is by the numbers that were received.

I am happy with the product! Its been easy and straight forward to use. Its great for data analytics. I leverage the reporting and components of the data to keep track of calls, messages and utilize the information to help our business strategize better. Customer service has been excellent as well! No issues or suggestions for improvements. I think once volume for our calls go up, we will have a better idea of all capabilities. Thanks!UPDATE: We have had one issue. Because these numbers are recycled, when dialing out from your line ensure the caller ID states your business number. Our number shows up as a random 10 letters and digits. The only way to rectify it is to call all phone providers (Rogers, Bell, Telus, etc.) and update your name. It's very time consuming.
Haven't had any traffic on the line, so tough to judge. Maybe you guys can give some marketing tips to your customers to drive traffic to the phone. That would get you that 5th Star.

Review.Titre: 800.com has allowed me to grow my…
Review.Contenu: 800.com has allowed me to grow my business without any contracts.   The toll free number can be forwarded to any phone I choose.  This helps me to never miss a radio advertising call.

Review.Contenu: some of the instructions were not very clear I had several days that I thought our number was active and it was not.  Over all I am happy about the service once we got it going.

800.com provides a lot of number choices, the phone calls are clear, and the customer service responds quickly, but the ios app needs further improvement

Review.Titre: Wow! Love your service. Thank you!
Review.Contenu: I am very impressed with your service. I am amazed at how I was able to find my vanity number after business hours quickly and efficiently. Thank you so much for providing this awesome service. I have already referred you to a friend who asked where I got my number.

After writing a scathing but truthful review, based on an unacceptable delay, the very next day they called me, out of concern for my issue. They fixed the problem and said that my review helped them become aware of the systemic issue which they now have fixed. Kudos to both them and Trustpilot !

Review.Titre: Great option for a virtual phone line/ answer machine
Review.Contenu: Using their service for 6 years now, and had no issues. We were on monthly billing and they just called to offer to save $200 by switching to annual, which is totally making sense for us and I appreciate them reaching out.

I am a new customer and was sent a welcome email, which I failed to reply to.  In response to my oversight, Anthony (800.com representative) called me to inquire as to whether I had any questions or needed any assistance setting up my service. He took time to answer my questions, perform test calls and adjust a few settings on my profile.  Anthony was knowledgeable, efficient, result-oriented and delightful!

Review.Titre: I am very grateful for how quickly they…
Review.Contenu: I am very grateful for how quickly they resolved my issue when my SMS wasn't working temporarily! You never know when purchasing a new product how the customer service is going to be but these guys did a wonderful job and everything is working perfectly right in time for me to launch my advertising as planned. Thanks again!

In this day and age where customer service is essentially non-existent 800.com came through !!! They walked me through everything and insured that my questions were answered and I was comfortable with their service!!! A real live person answered the phone and actually spoke professionally and effectively … very knowledgeable and a very pleasant experience !!!! Loved it!!!

Review.Titre: I truly just didn’t expect all of the…
Review.Contenu: I truly just didn’t expect all of the types of services that come along with the 866 number I had. Also, I did not type in 7 mercies. I had just typed in Mercies, as the charity I work with is called Divine Mercies. There two types of divine mercies, the corpora and spiritual works of mercy. There are 7 of each. 7 Corporal works of mercy and 7 spiritual works of mercy. The number 866-7-Mercies was the first to pop up as an alternative to my first choice which must not have been available, and it just seemed like it was meant to be.

The initial search to create a unique number was easy.  The follow up call/voicemail to let me know the number is now in service was appreciated and the user friendly interface to create your own greeting.

I had been working on getting a particular phone number for awhile with no luck at all. Until, I contacted 800.com! It could not have been easier! I found that my number was available & purchased it. The next morning I talked with Anthony who was kind, helpful, patient and well informed on how to set me up to receive calls, texts, messages etc…everything I needed to complete to get my ministry number ready to go BEFORE my number was even activated!! Once my number was activated I was already to go immediately. And i received another call from Anthony asking if everything was working well and if i had any questions. Anthony provided impeccable customer service!! I’m so glad I got my 800 number from 800.com.

Very Professional. I've been working with Dominic. Super professional and helpful and when I was too busy to reply to an email, he picked up the phone and called. Got everything resolved immediately. Great company!

John called to let me know my services were working.  He too was very patient and kind and checked all the numbers. I love my service and all of my employees love the service.  So great for us!!

Review.Titre: The Perfect Tool for my business.
Review.Contenu: 800.com was super easy to set up and works great for my business. They also have amazing customer support.

Being open and transparent, we have had some feedback from clients and prospects that they were having trouble to navigate through some of the features on the phone system.We had to make the necessary adjustments to help our company better communicate with potential customers and current clients, as we build and grow.Honestly, this is one of the best customer experiences  that I have had in a long time and appreciate. Thank you, Anthony for your excellent customer service. What I appreciated most was that this representative listened to my concerns and was able to immediately identify with what we needed - this was a time sensitive issue, to help our business improve our customer service. Knowing the product and service inside out was key in addressing my concerns to quickly find a resolve too. The representative made a few recommendations after assessing the problem and then worked with me to do a test run of the all the changes. Like the ongoing support throughout the entire call and a willingness to help- "let me try something else, let me look into something, is there anything else I can do for you, I want to make sure it works while I have you on the phone". Appreciate the interaction, answered my questions/concerns and found the right product/service to resolve the problems as quickly as possible. This will help to increase call rates and conversion as we are starting our sales and marketing campaign.Thank you, for your customer support.Warmly,Sherryl Cole Griffiths, FounderPICKLE ME GREENCommercial and Residential Property Services
Great product and services, We got all that we needed for our phone system on One platform. We're very satisfy! Tommy
